SELECT ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_ID ,REP_ROUT_NM ,ROUT_NM ,ROUT_LEN FROM BMS_ROUT_MST WHERE DEL_YN != 'Y'
AND REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY REP_ROUT_NM

SELECT A.OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.NODE_ID ,B.NODE_NM AS STTN_NM FROM BRT_STTN_PNCTLTY_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_NODE_CMPSTN B ON A.NODE_ID = B.NODE_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND B.NODE_TYPE = 'NT002' GROUP BY A.NODE_ID ORDER BY B.NODE_SN

SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.NODE_ID ,B.STTN_NM ,CONCAT(A.STAT_H, '시') AS STAT_H ,DELAY_TIME
DATE_FORMAT(DATE(A.OPER_DT), '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.NODE_ID ,A.DAY_WEEK ,B.STTN_NM ,CONCAT(A.STAT_H, '시') AS STAT_H ,SUM(DELAY_TIME) AS DELAY_TIME
MONTH(A.OPER_DT) AS OPER_DT ,A.REP_ROUT_ID ,A.ROUT_ID ,A.NODE_ID ,B.STTN_NM ,CONCAT(A.STAT_H, '시') AS STAT_H ,SUM(DELAY_TIME) AS DELAY_TIME
FROM BRT_STTN_PNCTLTY_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_STTN_MST B ON A.NODE_ID = B.STTN_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND A.NODE_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}
AND A.STAT_H BETWEEN #{ST_STAT_H} AND #{ED_STAT_H}
GROUP BY OPER_DT, NODE_ID, A.STAT_H ORDER BY OPER_DT, NODE_ID, A.STAT_H
GROUP BY DAY_WEEK, A.NODE_ID ORDER BY A.NODE_ID, DAY_WEEK
GROUP BY A.NODE_ID ORDER BY A.NODE_ID, A.OPER_DT

FROM BRT_STTN_PNCTLTY_STAT A LEFT JOIN BMS_STTN_MST B ON A.NODE_ID = B.STTN_ID WHERE A.ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} AND A.NODE_ID IN
#{item}
AND DATE_FORMAT(A.OPER_DT, '%Y%m%d') BETWEEN #{F_DATE} AND #{L_DATE}

FROM BRT_STTN_PNCTLTY_STAT
